Based on the user's preferences and the available movies, I would recommend "The Adventures of Tom Sawyer" as a potential recommendation.

"The Adventures of Tom Sawyer" is a classic novel by Mark Twain about a young boy named Tom who lives in a small town called St. Petersburg with his older sister Sally and their alcoholic father Noah who has no idea that Tom is his son.

Tom's life takes an interesting turn when he discovers that his town is being prepared to be destroyed by a meteorite that is on its way towards Earth.

Tom decides to take action and try to stop the meteorite from destroying his town.

Tom sets out on a journey to find out where the meteorite will land and what damage it will cause to the people who live in the areas that are affected by the meteorite landing.

Tom meets many interesting people along the way on his journey to find out where the meteorite will land.
